content:
The Enrique Langsam Family


From: "David Thaler"  
To:  
Subject: Fw: Langsam family in Buenos Aires 
Date: Mon, 9 Jul 2001 10:19:15 -0500 


----- Original Message -----
From: "David Thaler" 
To: "Suzan Wynne" 
Sent: Sunday, June 24, 2001 7:51 PM
Subject: Langsam family in Buenos Aires



> Dear Suzan,
>
> Following your comment, I contacted
>
> Mr. Enrique Langsam
> tel +54 11 4832-8649
> e-mail:    quico@movi.com.ar
>
> His father and uncles inmigrated from Galicia but already passed away.
> Anyway, Enrique is going to collect some information and vital records
with
> his mother looking to precise details and you can contact him if you wish.
>
> There are 16 Langsams in the phone book (www.paginasamarillas.com.ar) but
I
> don't know if they are from the same family branch or not.
>
> By the way, I saw Langsam mentioned in Ustrzyki Dolne's Yizkor book.
>
> David Thaler
> Buenos Aires/ Argentina
>
> searching:
> Galicia- Ustrzyki Dolne: THALER
> Galicia- Dynow :            TALMUD, GRÜNBAUM
> Odessa area/Ukraine:   OSTROVSKY, WASSERMAN, RESNIK
> Podolia area/Ukraine:   GILLER, GALER, GUELERMAN

_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Tue, 10 Jul 2001 01:51:51 -0400
To: quico@movi.com.ar
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: Fw: Langsam family in Buenos Aires

Hi,

I am also researching the LANGSAM family. Have you had a chance to view my site at
www.langsam.com

I would be happy to hear from you and assist in your research in any way possible.

Thanks!
Moishe Miller
Brooklyn, NY
moishe@langsam.com
_________________________________________________________________________
From: "David Thaler"  
To:  
Subject: Fw: Langsam family in Buenos Aires 
Date: Sat, 8 Sep 2001 10:10:16 -0300 


Hi Moishe,


Just curiosity, did you succeed contacting any Langsam in Buenos Aires or
Enrique Langsam?


Mr. Enrique Langsam
tel +54 11 4832-8649
e-mail:    quico@movi.com.ar
  
_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Sat, 08 Sep 2001 23:10:15 -0400
To: dathaler@fibertel.com.ar
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Fwd: Re: Fw: Langsam family in Buenos Aires

Hi,
Thanks so much for your interest and support. I sent him a note two months ago (see below) but have not received a response). Any ideas?
-Moishe
moishe@langsam.com  
_________________________________________________________________________
From: "David Thaler"  
To:  
Subject: Re: Fw: Langsam family in Buenos Aires 
Date: Thu, 20 Sep 2001 23:23:37 -0300 

Allow a couple of days to contact them agaim

Shana Tova

David

_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Thu, 17 Oct 2002 06:44:56 -0400 
From: Suzan & Ron Wynne  
Subject: Re: H2 
To: moishe@langsam.com 


Well, you know, last June I got a name and email address for Enrique Langsam
in Buenos Aires from David Thaler.  If you can get him to respond, he may be
able to help with H2 and several other branches in that fair city.  David
said that Enrique's father and uncles (unnamed) immigrated from Galicia and
that Enrique was willing to share what he knew.  David said that there were
16 Langsams in the phone directory.  I tried reaching Enrique and he already
had my email address but no reply.  I don't know if he does English and that
may have been the problem.  His phone number is +54 11 4832-8649 and his
email address in June 2001 was quico@movi.com.ar.


Suzan


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 6/23/2004
